```{r} #| echo: false knitr::opts_chunk$set(warning = FALSE) knitr::opts_chunk$set(message = FALSE) knitr::opts_chunk$set(echo = FALSE) ``` We are the Urban Institute Employees Union and represent over 250 employees at the Urban Institute. We are a proud member of the Non Profit Employees Union ([NPEU](https://npeu.org/)). ‚úäüèæ Please complete this short [survey](https://docs.google.com/forms/d/e/1FAIpQLSdN7tSfEI8r6dNFDn3T3OKNVKy3jofp6K4xJea0aai0LXmTTA/viewform?usp=sf_link) to submit feedback on February 2023 Town Hall and your ideas on what to potentially include in our first contract. We will consider all ideas, however, we cannot guarantee all ideas submitted will be secured in the first contract. ## Newsletters You can find our past newsletters below, which we send monthly to unit members: - [February 2023](https://docs.google.com/document/d/16EB-6pulA1V9sntclsp9SujhQeJQSHn-T7Sz8N2T5uU/edit?usp=sharing) - [November 2022](https://docs.google.com/document/d/14V58WLVBl0wBFOHb7copNPA5bXE4xf60uJ_6t-G04_k/edit?usp=sharing) - [October 2022](https://docs.google.com/document/d/1s-g54BiWcWztCowIgo9uLEzPLsHOEaWpKgLd3Os8wWo/edit?usp=sharing) - [September 2022](https://docs.google.com/document/d/1w79BQVswKUSJ3tt0OQr-NeqQH7a5Fuat4kzjkK2IP1Q/edit?usp=sharing) - [April 2022](https://docs.google.com/document/d/1qcJzLOe3r1pCXIldQ4bhgT7cbYzCwF9Gh9XVYl7ZyS0/edit?usp=sharing) - [March 2022](https://docs.google.com/document/d/1gwih0xYk8Gbe7fb4zorW5K2w96K8wOC98dz5E1tioXY/edit?usp=sharing) - [February 2022](https://docs.google.com/document/d/1Wh2-edQWHp7gqSao6lNg3J4aOvPd0W_RZqUasa8N6ZE/edit?usp=sharing) - [January 2022](https://docs.google.com/document/d/1bdTn-MZtR6ARlZTZuj__-py76IFE535vzWv-FsUesS8/edit?usp=sharing) - [December 2021](https://docs.google.com/document/d/16i1MRvnMVu5IpDeVFRAEQIVmXSHlf5JPXk3bCoBa5Ek/edit?usp=sharing) - [November 2021](https://docs.google.com/document/d/1pqBx07K_dPViVbqyeeY_HLSPrT6QmITWB2MdSwltI2E/edit?usp=sharing) - [September 2021](https://docs.google.com/document/d/1kacC4iwr9HXOQB2MP0D6OmKhFFh1RVXmNndVE17FhgE/edit?usp=sharing)
## Upcoming Events Coming Soon!
## Free Swag If you're a member of the Union, you can get a free t-shirt and button from NPEU! Visit the [NPEU website](https://nonprofitunion.myshopify.com/) and use a discount code (reach out to a member of the [BC](about.qmd#bargaining-committee) for the code) to get one t-shirt and two buttons at no cost. When you receive your swag, feel free to post a selfie on social media, tag [\@NonprofitUnion](https://twitter.com/NonprofitUnion) and [\@UrbanInst_Union](https://twitter.com/urbaninst_union) and use the hashtag #SolidarityForGood.
